articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: India's cricket bat supply threatened as Kashmiri farmers turn to plywood industry over willow
articles.description: As the supply of willow trees dwindles, the faster-growing poplar tree is now being preferred by the booming plywood industry, and cricket bat makers are worried.
articles.content:
Lines of shops display neat stacks of willow wood along a nondescript motorway in Indian-controlled Kashmir's Sangam village.
<ul><li>Kashmir's cricket bat industry manufactures nearly 1 million bat… [+2424 chars]

articles.title: Former acting Cricket SA CEO set for return to administration with Border?
articles.description: The Border Cricket Board's keenness on Cricket South Africa's former chief commercial officer and acting CEO Kugandrie Govender could set them on a collision course with the mother body.
articles.content:
• The Border Cricket Board's keenness on Kugandrie Govender as a prospective chief executive officer may see them collide with Cricket South Africa.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
